column5: Large custom home with 5 bedrooms and 4 full baths. Secured property with a gated entrance. Open concept living/dining/kitchen for great family fun! Complete kitchen on back porch with large serving/eating area. Wood burning fireplace and TV complete the outdoor living space. For the young at heart... an awesome 3 story tree house to explore!  While here, check out \
column8: XL Custom Home in Country close to Dfw/Arlington
